argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in data type that is not XML, with a maximum length of 16 336 bytes.

description: The HEX function returns a hexadecimal representation of a value as a character string.
sample:
SELECT HEX(MGRNO)
     INTO :HEX_MGRNO
     FROM DEPARTMENT
     WHERE DEPTNAME = 'PLANNING'
